sourcesContent:
import {
    IonMenu,
    IonContent,
    IonList,
    IonListHeader,
    IonNote,
    IonMenuToggle,
    IonItem,
    IonLabel,
} from "@ionic/react";
import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom";

const Menu: React.FC<{

}> = (props) => {
    const location = useLocation()
    return (
        <IonMenu contentId="main-content">
            <IonContent className="ion-padding">
                <IonList>
                    <IonListHeader></IonListHeader>
                    <IonNote>hardtext@anabella.com</IonNote>
                    <IonMenuToggle autoHide={false}>
                        <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/company/information' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/company/information" routerDirection="none">
                            <IonLabel>Company</IonLabel>
                        </IonItem>
                        <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/company/department' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/company/department" routerDirection="none">
                            <IonLabel>Department</IonLabel>
                        </IonItem>
                        <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/company/position' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/company/position" routerDirection="none">
                            <IonLabel>Position</IonLabel>
                        </IonItem>
                    </IonMenuToggle>
                </IonList>
                <IonList>
                    <IonListHeader>Attendance</IonListHeader>
                    <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/company/attendance/day' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/company/attendance/day" routerDirection="none">
                        <IonLabel>Weekday</IonLabel>
                    </IonItem>
                    <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/company/attendance/holiday' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/company/attendance/holiday" routerDirection="none">
                        <IonLabel>Holiday</IonLabel>
                    </IonItem>
                    <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/company/attendance' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/company/attendance" routerDirection="none">
                        <IonLabel>Option</IonLabel>
                    </IonItem>
                </IonList>
                <IonList>
                    <IonListHeader>Index</IonListHeader>
                    <IonItem routerLink="/dashboard" routerDirection="none">
                        <IonLabel>Dashboard</IonLabel>
                    </IonItem>
                </IonList>
            </IonContent>
        </IonMenu>
    );
};

export default Menu;
